name: Facebook Comment AI Moderator with Notion & Gemini

user.name: Abdullah Alshiekh
user.bio:
üöÄ Automation pro building AI-powered workflows with n8n.
üíº Special focus on real use cases
üîß Love clean, flexible, and business-ready automations.

description:
## üß© Problem Solved
Eliminates the slow, inconsistent, and error-prone process of manually replying to Facebook comments by automating it with AI, ensuring fast, accurate, and on-brand customer engagement 24/7.

## üìù Description
This workflow automatically monitors your latest Facebook post for new comments. For each new comment, an AI agent instantly generates a friendly, personalized reply in Egyptian Arabic, using your Notion knowledge base to ensure all product info is accurate. It prevents spam by never replying to the same comment twice.

Simple Flow: New Comment ‚Üí Duplicate Check ‚Üí AI Analysis ‚Üí Post Reply ‚Üí Log Action.

## üéØ Key Benefits
24/7 Instant Replies: Engage customers immediately, anytime.

Perfect Brand Voice: Consistent, empathetic, natural Egyptian Arabic tone in every reply.

Always Accurate: Pulls facts directly from your knowledge base; never invents details.

No Duplicate Replies: Robust checks ensure each comment gets only one response.

Huge Time Saver: Frees your team from constantly monitoring comments.

## üõ†Ô∏è Core Features
Facebook API Integration (Read & Reply)

Notion Database Integration (Knowledge Base & Logging)

AI Response Generation (Google Gemini)

Duplicate Comment Prevention

Automated Workflow Logic

## üîß Requirements
Facebook Access Token with pages_read_engagement and pages_manage_posts permissions.

Two Notion Databases: One for your product knowledge, one to log processed comments.

Google Gemini API Key for AI.

n8n Credentials for Facebook, Notion, and Gemini.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Quick Customization
Tone & Style: Edit the prompt in the Generate Customer Reply node.

Product Info: Add fields to your Notion Knowledge Base database.

Escalation: Add a step to flag angry comments for a human agent.

## üß† Perfect For
E-commerce: Answering product questions on promo posts.

Healthcare: Providing accurate drug info with compassion.

Local Businesses: Replying to queries about hours/menu items.

Any Business that wants fast, professional customer engagement on social media.


Need help? Connect on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdallaelshikh0/)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.text:
=You are a helpful, friendly, and empathetic customer support agent for [COMPANY_NAME], a [COMPANY_TYPE] company in [COUNTRY].  

Your job is to read the customer's comment and reply in [TARGET_LANGUAGE] in a natural, unisex, and humanized way that feels warm and personal.  

Guidelines for your replies:
- Always reply as if you are a [NATIONALITY] person talking naturally.  
- Keep the tone friendly, respectful, and caring.  
- Use short, conversational sentences (don't sound like a machine).  
- Mention [COMPANY_NAME] naturally when relevant.  
- Always write in a *unisex style*.  
- Match the *tone of the customer's comment*.  
- Never use [FORBIDDEN_EXPRESSIONS]. Always use [PREFERRED_EXPRESSIONS] instead. 
- The word "[SPECIFIC_FORBIDDEN_WORD]" is strictly forbidden. Never use it in replies. Always use "[PREFERRED_ALTERNATIVE]" or another [TARGET_LANGUAGE] greeting instead.

 Whenever the customer asks about products, prices, or descriptions, use the Knowledge Base "" {{ $('KB Arrange').item.json.knowledgeContext }}"" to look up the correct information **before replying**.  
 If the Knowledge Base does not contain the answer, reply politely and naturally without inventing details.  

Here is the customer's comment:  
""{{ 
  $('Last Post Fetcher').first().json.data
    .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.created_time) - new Date(a.created_time))[0].message || ""
}}
""  

Now generate a reply in [TARGET_LANGUAGE] only.

conditions.richTextValue: ={{    $('Last Post Fetcher').first().json.data     .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.created_time) - new Date(a.created_time))[0].id  }}

propertyValues.textContent: ={{    $('Last Post Fetcher').first().json.data     .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.created_time) - new Date(a.created_time))[0].id  }}

parameters.content: Initiates the workflow by retrieving all posts from the specified Facebook Page via the Graph API.
Processes the list of posts to isolate the most recently published one.
Queries a database to verify if the latest comment's unique ID has already been processed, preventing duplicate replies.
Fetches the complete, up-to-date product information and knowledge base from the connected Notion database.
Transforms the raw knowledge base data into a structured and easily searchable format for the AI model.
A conditional gate; it only allows the workflow to proceed if the comment is new
Extracts the full content and metadata of the most recent comment from the latest post.
The core processing unit. It analyzes the customer's comment, consults the knowledge base for factual responses, and generates a personalized, empathetic reply in the target language.
Takes the AI-generated response and posts it as a reply to the customer's comment on Facebook.
Logs the ID of the newly processed comment into the database to mark it as complete and prevent reprocessing in the future.
